reviews.title: anti staining !
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] one of the main problems i have with stick deodorant is the staining that comes on my shirts but this works so well that it doesn't stain and it's transparent enough and doesn't leave any kind of markings

reviews.title: Anti staining deodorant
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I was a little hesitant to try the sauve invisible solid deodorant as every white deodorant claiming to be invisible has not worked for me. I was pleasantly surprised at how truly invisible the deodorant is! I even tested it against dark clothing and it does not stain my clothes which is a huge plus! I got the tropical scent and I love how it smells and not to mention the fragrance is long lasting.

reviews.title: No more white marks
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This deodorant worked well at keeping odor away but it did not help with wetness. I still has perspiration under my arms. The smell of the deodorant was decent . It faintly smelled like pineapples. I was happy to see it did not stain my black shirt and only stayed on my own skin.

reviews.title: Tropical and works
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This smells definitely tropical but also a bit feminine. It definitely smells nice but may not be the best for high output activities. It works well throughout the day as both a deodorant and antiperspirant for every day use.
[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Not a fan of the scent but again it worked for a normal day. Didn't leave me feeling dry and lasted all day.

reviews.title: solid deodorant
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is an effective solid deodorant. I tend to prefer the gels because they don't leave marks on black clothes. I didn't like the smell unfortunately.
[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Sorry i left my review on the tropical one one the powder fresh responce, I have always used suave powder fresh but i like the tropical one better.

[This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received Suave Antiperspirant Deodorants in both Powder & Tropical Paradise for testing purposes. I like the scent of both, but they do not last all day, and definitely not for 24 hours. I have read other consumers comments about Suave changing this product and that it's not for the better. This is the first time I've tried their deodorants so I can't personally compare it. But I won't be purchasing this product. I have a clinical strength that works all day and doesn't leave white marks on my clothes. I appreciate the opportunity to try these. Maybe if they change them, so it actually lasts for 24 hours, I would change my mind.
